text: Frank Pietrzok (20 June 1964 – 3 February 2022) was a German politician. He was a member of the Social Democratic Party of Germany. He was in the Bürgerschaft of Bremen from 1999 to 2005. He was born in Xanten, West Germany. Pietrzok died in a paragliding accident in La Unión, Colombia on 3 February 2022 at the age of 57. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Accidental deaths Category:Politicians from Bremen (state)
title: Frank Pietrzok
